content: **knitted mittens in drops nepal mobile mittens with opening for thumb and index finger ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ne-272 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- sizes s/m m/l **materials** drops nepal from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100 g color 6273 cerise ------------------------------------------------------- accessories for the piece **knitting gauge** 19 stitches in width and 25 row in height with stockinette stitch = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 4 mm / us 6 drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm / us 4 for rib the needle size is only a guide if you have too many stitches on 10 cm / 4 change to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm / 4 change to a smaller needle size
